TopicTitle: Should I or shot I not?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I don't know if this is the best place to post this or not so if it is incorrect sorry.

I've got exoerience modeling and texturing and am thinking about getting into KSP modding. Problem, I have no experience writing CFG files or any kind of code what so ever. I am wondering from everyone's point of view should I give it a try? I would love to make some new science parts and other pieces but would need help doing the writing for them.

Go for it. Once you get your head round Unity and CFG's its a piece of cake. I would recommend just tinkering with the stock parts, just try and make an antenna function like a battery or something, model a fuel tank or whatever, and replace a stock model with it in a new part.
